name: U2opia Mobile
tag_list: ussd, mobile, social-networks, facebook, application, mobile-handset, phone, twitter, innovative, software, wireless
overview:
U2opia Mobile is a global provider of mobile applications that enables the access and monetisation of internet on mobile. It is a new entrant in a dynamic and rapidly growing industry. The company’s business monetizes opportunities in converging services from global internet giants with telecom carriers across the globe. This Singapore-based software applications developer has develops applications for mobile phones.

The company’s innovative product line includes Fonetwish, which is an USSD based interactive service which brings the power of internet to every mobile phone. There is no need to download any specific software to use this application. It works on all mobile handsets from smartest to simplest. It empowers mobile handsets to interact with Facebook, Twitter, email and web applications, enabling people across the globe to get connected with friends and community.

funding_rounds.source_description: Matrix Partners India invests in U2opia Mobile

milestones.description: Matrix Partners India today announced that it has invested as the sole investor in the first institutional round of funding of U2opia Mobile Pte Ltd (U2opia). U2opia creates social applications that help users access their social networks on mobile.
milestones.source_description: Matrix Partners India invests in U2opia Mobile

milestones.description: Airtel today announced that starting today, its 150 million plus customers in India can now simply dial *325# (and “*fbk#” for non-qwerty mobile handsets) to access Facebook  without subscribing to data plans.
milestones.source_description: Airtel Launches USSD Based Facebook Access

milestones.description: Social networking access seems to be that one important feature that would complete a mobile service. Taking a cue from this, one of India’s rapidly growing mobile service providers, Tata Docomo have announced their USSD (Unstructured Supplementary Servic
milestones.source_description: TATA Docomo Introduces Facebook, Twitter Access via USSD

milestones.description: Singapore-based app development company U2opia Mobile has developed an app, Facebook by Fonetwish, that allows Indonesians to check their Facebook profiles, update their status, and view their friends’ walls, all without Internet access.

milestones.source_description: Telkomsel Meluncurkan Facebook by Fonetwish di Indonesia
